      • isValidTravelDirection

        public static boolean isValidTravelDirection(Direction travelDirection)
        Check whether the given travelDirection is a valid travelDirection for all the Launchable objects.
        Parameters:
        travelDirection - The travelDirection to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given value is not null and doesn't represent a diagonal direction
